name: AC Transit: East Bay Paratransit
description: Door-to-door transit for AC Transit/BART service area
fullDescription: East Bay Paratransit is a shared-ride, door-to-door service for people who are unable to use AC Transit or BART due to a disability. The service covers Alameda and western Contra Costa counties.
whatTheyOffer:
- Door-to-door shared ride service
- Service area covers AC Transit and BART service areas
- Same-day and advance reservation options
- Free rides for personal care attendants
- Wheelchair accessible vehicles
howToGetIt:
1. Apply for ADA paratransit eligibility
2. Complete application at actransit.org/paratransit
3. In-person assessment may be required
4. Once certified, call to schedule rides
